name: Explainer recommendations are consistent between runs
title: Explainer recommendations are consistent between runs

testSteps.description: Explainer recommendations are consistent between runs #1 - Site: Equinox Erasmus

children.description: Given There are archive results for "Equinox Erasmus"
When Des generates recommendations for "Equinox Erasmus"
Then Des sees that the recommendations for "Equinox Erasmus" are consistent over time
Como ensures that data in table for Acme in column Licence Status does equal "valid"

exception.message:
Expected data in table for Acme in column Licence Status to equal "valid"

Expectation: equals('valid')

Expected string: valid
Received string: latest

    at /home/runner/work/OPtest/OPtest/features/step-definitions/deployment.steps.ts:10:12

userStory.narrative:
The advisor is an LLM agent, therefore:
- The output may not be deterministic
- The output may differ between runs
- The output may differ as the base model is updated
- The advisor should indicate its level of confidence

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given There are archive results for "<Site>"
When Des generates recommendations for "<Site>"
Then Des sees that the recommendations for "<Site>" are consistent over time
